other_title: Chu-2 Byo demo Koi ga Shitai (Japanese)
Regardless of My Adolescent Delusions of Grandeur, I Want a Date!
中二病でも恋がしたい！ (Japanese)
plot: High school freshman Yūta Togashi was once a "chūnibyō patient" i.e. an overly self-conscious middle schooler. He wants to bury this embarrassing past and begins a new life in high school—unsuccessfully. His classmate Rikka Takanashi, a "current" chūnibyō patient, has found traces of residual symptoms on him and used the fact to force Togashi "making a contract" with her.
ending_theme: "Shikkoku ni Odoru Haou Bushi" by ZAQ
insert_song: "Hajimari no Tane" (始まりの種) by ZAQ (ep 8)
"Kimi no Tonari wa" (きみのとなりは) by ZAQ (ep 10)
"Miage te Goran Yoru no Hoshi o" (見上げてごらん夜の星を) by Maaya Uchida (ep 10)
